The Account class represents a bank account with relevant details such as account ID, type, username, password, balance, and status.

Reader
The Reader class provides methods to read data from CSV files and populate lists of various entities, such as users, accounts, transactions, tasks, goals, and support information.

The Task class represents a task in the system, including details such as task ID, description, title, start and end dates, associated user, reward, and completion status.
